CA.securityDepositLimit: 2 months rent for unfurnished, 3 months for furnished
commonRisks: Waiver of landlord liability for negligence.
Automatic lease renewal without sufficient notice period for tenant to terminate.
Excessive late fees or unclear calculation methods.
Clauses allowing landlord to take tenant's personal property for unpaid rent (illegal).
Restrictions on guests or roommates that violate state/city law.

TX.securityDepositLimit: No state statutory limit, must be reasonable.
TX.landlordEntryNotice: Lease typically defines, otherwise reasonable prior notice unless emergency.
commonRisks: Waiver of right to a jury trial.
Tenant responsible for all repairs, regardless of cause.
Non-refundable fees that are excessively high or not clearly defined.
